import statsmodels.api  as sm 
X = np.append(arr = np.ones((159,1)).astype(int), values=data.iloc[:,:-1], axis=1 )
X_l = data.iloc[:,[2,3,4]].values
r_ols = sm.OLS(endog = data.iloc[:,-1:], exog =X_l)
r = r_ols.fit()
print(r.summary())
